What should I do if I get an error message saying "Your wallet.dat is not matching the blockchain. Please restart the wallet with -reindex param"?

This error message is likely due to attempting to move coinbase coins without following Verus blockchain rules. To resolve this, you need to shield your coinbase coins by moving them through a private address (zaddress) first. Follow these steps:

1. Create a private address (starting with `zs`) in the "Receive" screen.
2. Copy the new private address to your clipboard.
3. Go to the "Mining" screen, select Verus, and select "Shield Rewards".
4. Leave "All unshielded funds" as the source and paste the new zaddress into the destination.
5. Click on "Continue".
6. Wait until you have a private balance showing on the Wallet screen.
7. Send again, this time from your private address to any normal transparent receive address that you have.

# Question: ERROR: Your wallet.dat is not matching the blockchain. Please restart the wallet with -reindex param.

It seems you probably trying to move coinbase coins that you must move them through a private address (zaddress) first by shielding your coinbases, which is required by Verus blockchain rules.

## Procedure

1. go to the "Receive" screen and make sure you have a private address (starting with `zs`), if you don't have that create one.
2. Copy the new private address to your clipboard
3. Go to the "Mining" screen, select Verus and select "Shield Rewards"
4. Leave "All unshielded funds" as the source and paste the new zaddress into the destination
5. Click on "Continue"
6. Wait a while until you have a private balance showing on the Wallet screen
7. Send again, this time from your private address to any normal transparent receive address that you have.

(submitted by @keda666, solution written by mikeout.vrsc@)

Note: revised 2020-04-24
Why do I need to shield my coinbase coins before moving them?

Shielding your coinbase coins is a requirement of the Verus blockchain rules. This is because coinbase coins need to be moved through a private address (zaddress) before they can be sent to a normal transparent receive address.

What is a private address (zaddress) and how do I create one?
A private address (zaddress) is a special type of address that starts with `zs`. You can create one in the "Receive" screen of your Verus wallet.
